page.topic: How to Place Borders Around Report Sections
page.description: The box object can be used in Layout Table reports to draw boxes and lines on the report, creating visual separation of data.

discussion.p: Borders and lines can be added to sections in a Layout Table report by adding a Box object. The Box object can be used to create a border around an entire group - including the header and footer - or for adding vertical lines separating columns of data. The style of the Box is defined using a style sheet. The Box object includes properties that allow you to override the styles defined in a style sheet.
